post:
I have a VPS with baltic servers in Lithuania that I no longer need. It is paid for until October 28 2013. 

Basic Specs:

OpenVZ
768MB RAM + 256MB vSwap
20GB HDD
100Mbps bandwidth (unmetered)
1/2 a core of Intel Xeon CPU X3470 ( 1/2 of 2.93GHz )

Benchmarks: http://serverbear.com/benchmark/2013/05/11/8OW4qibxDwTONknK

Edit: Renewal cost is Euro 35.97 per 6 months after Oct 28th.

You can have this VPS for just $10 total. I accept payment via Skrill (moneybookers) or bitcoins. Sorry no paypal. 

PM me if you want it.
